website_summaries.verdict: Works well for yeast infections, digestive problems, and cognitive skills.
pros: Some say these probiotics have helped with memory improvement
Chronic yeast infections respond well to these
cons: The smell from the plastic bottle may leak into the capsules

website_summaries.verdict: Effective for women, but may provide more nutrients than most men would need in a probiotic supplement.
pros: Formulated especially for women's health needs, with additional supporting vitamins and supplements targeting women's unique health needs
cons: Some bottles did not contain the designated number of capsules

website_summaries.verdict: Geared toward providing a healthy balance of gut bacteria in women, providing relief from constipation, and support for vaginal health.
pros: Vegetarian and free from dairy, soy, and gluten
Does not cause cramping or bloating
cons: Plastic bottle is not recyclable in most city recycling programs
Some consumers report the plastic smells and negatively affects the smell of the capsules
Some report not getting all 30 pills in their shipment

customer_reviews.title: Toxic plastic bottle
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about this product, but initiated a return immediately upon delivery. This product is packaged in a plastic “no 7” bottle. Number 7 is a catch-all plastic, one of the most toxic plastics and is known for contaminating it’s contents. It’s a shame that Garden of Life chose this packaging when so many of their other products come in glass containers. Wrong container for well-informed, health conscious consumers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible chemical smell from plastic container!!!  Leached into capsules!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t even use this product! When I lift the cap open, the strong chemical smell from the plastic container, knocks me over! So I thought, well maybe... that smell hasn’t leached into the capsules?!?! Unfortunately when I put a capsule in my mouth the smell is so strong and I can actually smell and taste the chemical taste on the capsule! I am shocked that a probiotic that seems to be such a quality one, would use this type of plastic to contain it! I will have to return it! ☹️
customer_reviews.author: Pearl

customer_reviews.title: Very Toxic Plastic #7 Container with BPA
customer_reviews.text: It does not make any sense that Garden of Life uses very toxic plastic #7 container with BPA for their health products. This defeats the purpose. The study shows that plastic #3, #6, and #7 contain very harmful chemicals that leach into anything that touches those plastic containers. They also strongly state that these plastics should be avoided. Garden of Life need to stop using such toxic plastic containers.
customer_reviews.author: Y.C.

customer_reviews.title: Only 27 pills in the bottle
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how to rate this product, I have no issues with the probiotics themselves, but the bottle advertised 30 pills and there were only 27 in the bottle. At a price of about $1 per pill that is pretty annoying. I don't like getting short changed.
customer_reviews.author: Linzy

customer_reviews.title: Shorted pills
customer_reviews.text: I noticed the bottle was kind of empty so i counted the pills and i was shorted about 6 pills!! Not cool. Will not be buying this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best women's probiotic out. I got this for chronic bv and haven't had an issue since 😘
customer_reviews.author: Lexi love

customer_reviews.title: Packaging has changed
customer_reviews.text: This was my second time getting these probiotics. This time, as others stated, the glass bottle was replaced with plastic and the chemical smell when opened made me not want to injest them. I will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Cubsfan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!! Especially for yeast infection prevention
customer_reviews.text: I have suffered from yeast infections pretty much since my young adult hood! Turns out it’s a hereditary issue. I pretty much was on Diflucan every few weeks. I tried pretty much just about everything. My doctor had mentioned probiotics to me, so I bought the ones that needed to be refrigerated and would forget them. So when I got this I was just trying something as a last resort... and I’m pleased to say it’s been 6 months since my last yeast infection!!!! And I’ve been on these probiotics for 6 months!!! I’m very happy I honestly never thought I’d find something.
customer_reviews.author: Zara

customer_reviews.title: Review on packaging
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this product so I can't tell you how effective it is just yet however the packaging is horrible. The top will not close which resulted in all of the capsules to spill in my bag. For $27 I think proper packaging should just be a given.
customer_reviews.author: rye

customer_reviews.title: CHEMICAL PLASTIC HOLDER...PROBIOTICS HAVE CHEMICAL STENCH
customer_reviews.text: I don't ever go out to write negative reviews. I think this is my first in over 13 years. This is SO sad, I love all of the other Garden of Life Vitamins I take that have come in glass bottles (and I take TONS of the other vitamins and recommend them, too!). These knocked you out when you opened the container with the chemical smell. Can they not put them in a glass bottle??? I'm so upset!!
customer_reviews.author: Joyful

customer_reviews.title: Horrible chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: I first opened these and noticed they didn’t have a safety seal, just a plastic wrap around the plastic bottle. After opening I noticed a very strong chemical smell which I could taste! So gross. I am Sending these back ASAP
customer_reviews.author: Catmom88

customer_reviews.title: BETTER THAN ANY PROBIOTIC EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: WOW WOW WOW!! This is the best probiotic ever!!! I am NOT joking! All others I tried gave me a headache!! This is also available in Men's!!! I have IBS-C and a slow colon and after 3 weeks of taking this I am regular everyday. Before I was taking stuff I couldn't go on my own and I'm not exaggerating! I sure hope they never stop making this product!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ronda L. Ringler

customer_reviews.title: Count them!
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying these probiotics for about 5 months now and love the product. However, I noticed that I was running out before I should. The bottle is supposed to contain 30 servings. Last month the bottle contained 28 capsules. This month the bottle contained 29 capsules. I emailed Garden of Life and they gave me a $3.00 off coupon for my next purchase and said that they're aware of the situation. I hope they fix it soon! Ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Russakis

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been taking these for a month and i have noticed a significant change in my bowel movements. Also it could all be in my head but my periods aren't as harsh on my body. Tmi i know lol
customer_reviews.author: Army01

customer_reviews.title: Literally the greatest probiotic for dairy senstivity
customer_reviews.text: I cannot recommend this product enough. I would give it unlimited stars if I could. I have dealt with dairy sensitivity for YEARS and had resigned myself to terrible pain every time I ate something with milk in it. I was skeptical of probiotics and I used a few other brands with no success. Then I tried this one. I take it every day and have not had dairy problems in MONTHS. I have recommended this product to probably a dozen people.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The bottle only had 25 pills. I will not purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: BAM

customer_reviews.title: Broke BV / Yeast Infection Cycle
customer_reviews.text: My wife for years was caught in a constant BV / yeast infection cycle. Antiobiotics clears up BV but allows yeast to get out of control. Even taking antifungal / antibiotics simultaneously was only a brief solution. These probiotics contain both digestive and vaginal probiotics that are shown to prevent UTI and yeast infections. Since being on them for a few years she's been problem free.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for a shelf-stable probiotic
customer_reviews.text: I use this probiotic to help with constipation and ensure the best gut health possible. As a mother who is breastfeeding I also want the probiotics to balance my mocrobiome so I can pass that along to me baby. I originally purchased this after having chronic yeast infections, and after taking this daily I have not once had a yeast infection. I was fearful that I would get a yeast infection while breastfeeding, but this has kept it at bay. I really believe this product helps, such a high bacterial count! I also love that it is shelf stable, not all probiotics are.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Why there is not any seal of the bottle?
customer_reviews.text: Am I supposed to receive the bottle without any seal? There is no seal on the outside side box, if that is ok, then there is no seal for the inside bottle either! I am going to return it any way, I don’t trust a medicine/pill that comes without any seal.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Good for digestion and lady bits
customer_reviews.text: I had to go on antibiotics for acne for a couple months and I hate those horrible pills for all the havoc they do in your intestines and lady parts and EVERYWHERE. I needed some hardcore probiotics to aid in digestion and to avoid a yeast infection and these were really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY - chemical smell and taste is AWFUL
customer_reviews.text: if i could give less stars i would. DO NOT BUT. read other reviews. the chemical taste and smell of this is AWFUL. i thought, oh maybe it won’t be that bad. but NO. the product works “okay” but it is not worth it. there are other probiotics that work as good if not better. i will be reverting back to another brand.
customer_reviews.author: rebecca s

customer_reviews.title: SCARY!
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be great product. Good formula. I wanted to try another Garden of Life Probiotic but now I'm scared. Very unfortunate that the packaging is downright scary. The toxic plastic smell coming from all 3 bottles I have is too scary for me. I dumped the product into a glass jar, smell remains on the empty and the transferred product. It would be nice if someone from Garden of Life would comment on here as to what this might be.
customer_reviews.author: KaMo

customer_reviews.title: UNSAFE
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely unacceptable... container arrived with only 14 (READ: FOURTEEN) pills in a bottle labeled to contain 30 capsules. I’d read reviews claiming counts were slightly short. I assumed there was some degree of human error involved. NOPE. As a breastfeeding mum, I’m uncomfortable taking ANY of these pills... forced to proceed under the assumption that (despite shipping with a plastic seal) this has been tampered with. GET IT TOGETHER, Amazon. I’ve now had run-ins with fraudulent vitamins, skin care products, makeup, BABY BOTTLES (oh yes, earlier this year I received fraudulent Dr. Brown’s bottles — shipped by Amazon, NOT a 3rd party seller). Your casual unwillingness to take responsibility for your actions (and those of your vendors) is exhausting.
customer_reviews.author: L. HILL

customer_reviews.title: Thank god for these pills!
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny! I have been taking them for a week, feel so much better, and has taken care of that chronic BV!
customer_reviews.author: khal

customer_reviews.title: Best probiotic I’ve found!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve taken probiotics for a while now. This is the best one I have found. I felt like I was having a bv flare up earlier this week. A day after taking this my symptoms started going away. Now 3 days later, it’s completely gone. I have taken Garden of Life Women’s probiotic before, but I got a cheaper probiotic last month. I won’t make that mistake again! My LO takes their kids probiotic and loves it!
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately, I will not purchase again 😔
customer_reviews.text: I love this probiotic but I just can’t get past the horrible taste and smell of the plastic. That can’t be healthy for anyone. I unfortunately will not purchase these again. I bought them for a second time hoping it was a fluke but it’s not. It really is that bad. For such a great company (or so I thought), I really hope they rethink this decision. Is the cost savings really worth your customers?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helps my IBS!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. I have IBS (diarrhea all the time) and ever since I started taking this, it’s helped tremendously!! I’ll have some bouts here and there, but seriously nothing like before. My stomach doesn’t cramp, I have normal bowel movements for the most part, and this was within a few days of taking it. I’ve now been taking it for a few months now (I wanted to make sure it really was working before submitting a review). Unlike other people, I personally don’t notice a chemical smell from the bottle and I haven’t been short pills. I would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Beranek

customer_reviews.title: No more BV 🙌🏽🙌🏽🙌🏽🙌🏽🙌🏽
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it. I’ve been dealing with chronic bv for years and NOTHING seemed to keep it away until I started taking this. I’ve been taking these for 2 months and still no bv. 🙌🏽 Wish I founded out about these sooner!!
customer_reviews.author: Katina

customer_reviews.title: Half the price of Whole Foods! This product works ...
customer_reviews.text: Half the price of Whole Foods! This product works amazingly- don't get sick anymore and it helps fight against stomach issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad chemical smell!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, the packaging has been changed and instead of a desiccant pack inside the bottle, it is lined with a moisture absorbing material. I don’t know what the material is, but it smells horrible; like a toxic chemical/ plastic smell. I can even taste it when swallowing the capsule! This is after leaving the bottle open to air out for 3 days! This is a brand I’ve long trusted so I am sad to say this will be my last order ☹️
customer_reviews.author: Eric I.

customer_reviews.title: No, no, nope
customer_reviews.text: Omg! What is the awful smell coming from the jar? Smells like straight up man made chemical. I took one and burped up that smell for hours. So awful. Do not buy these. I’m so disappointed. Garden of Life is my usual go to, I’ve never been let down until now. Please,please, please change this packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: This probiotic supplement is helping me greatly with getting rid ...
customer_reviews.text: This probiotic supplement is helping me greatly with getting rid of toenail fungus, and I my right knee also has ceased to quit hurting. I will always keep a supply of this on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Kusak

customer_reviews.title: strong paint like smell
customer_reviews.text: Opened the bottle and smelled the strong pungent smell that reminded me of paint fumes. Went ahead and started taking it for about 15 days convincing myself that it was in my mind just so that I would not have to miss a day with probiotics especially because I am a huge fan of dr. perlmutter. I wish I had listened to my gut because after reading some reviews I realized I am not alone! I've decided not to buy this product again unless the container changes to a non-toxic and odorless one.
customer_reviews.author: boston terrier dog mom

customer_reviews.title: The last 3 bottles I ordered were not a complete count of capsules......only 29
customer_reviews.text: I really like the product...however....upon ordering the last 3 bottles, the tablet count was only 29, not 30. So I have been shorted the capsule count. I could understand one bottle missing a capsule...but my last 3 orders missing a capsule....NOPE....I noticed other reviews said the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My fav women's probiotic
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a lot of probiotics over the last few years and this one has to be my favorite thus far. Many women specific probiotics I've tried have either wrecked my gut OR messed with my lady bits too much. But Garden of Life has done the job in keeping my V functioning at her highest while promoting regularity with my gut bacteria. This is the only probiotic I'll ever take from now on. I've experienced zero bloating, zero yeast infections, and have had continuously normal bowel movements. Would 10/10 recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah VanLaningham

customer_reviews.title: love/hate relationship with this one
customer_reviews.text: My body loves this one. BUT the smell? And I'm reading other reviews and apparently its from the TOXIC PLASTIC BOTTLING?! that scares tf outta me. But this particular probiotic works best for me so I'm torn between continuing to look at other ones or just ordering more of these and throwing them in a glass jar and hoping none of the toxic stuff made it into my pills because who knows how long they have been sitting in the bottle :(
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Kudjoe

customer_reviews.title: Actually works
customer_reviews.text: Gonna be graphic. 1. I have had IBS-C for ever. I’d go 3-4 days without pooping. After taking these I go every day! Which is a big deal for people like me lol 2. I noticed that as my hormones changed during the month, so did my lady parts (if you catch my drift). Now that I take this, everything down there stays great and pleasant and no hormonal changes.
customer_reviews.author: Tdanza

customer_reviews.title: miracle worker
customer_reviews.text: Wowwie!! So far, I have taken just one of these and my yeast infection is finally going away. I was also having a terrible time with heart burn. Nothing worked and it was getting much worse but it's gone! Thank you, Thank you Thank you Bella Vita update; I ordered another 30 capsules and it was late. All of my symptoms returned after 3 or 4 days. Finally got it with some postage due. Small price to pay for what it does for me. LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.author: George Friedman

customer_reviews.title: Taking it for life
customer_reviews.text: I’ll probably take it for life. My breath and my husband’s breath is so fresh!!! (yes he took it too, not anymore but his breath didn’t go back to the way it smelled before) You notice it almost instantly. There are so many wonderful benefits. I’ve been taking it so long it’s hard to remember the changes I noticed when I started taking it there were many! But when I run out..... I notice them come back. Especially as a female..... and my stomach, I am not as regular when I run out. So I have it sent monthly to me. It’s also WAYYY cheaper on here than Sprouts. I be tried MANY probiotics this product far exceeds them all.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Allenbaugh

customer_reviews.title: I love it my tummy feel so much better
customer_reviews.text: I love it my tummy feel so much better!! I noticed that it reduces my hunger I don’t know why but since I started taking in since the first day I noticed that I’m never hungry like I used to be and when I eat my stomach feel good I don’t have any issues like I used to have especially me that I don’t have a gallbladder so I love it recommended 100%
customer_reviews.author: Beatriz Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: highest number and most diverse strains but pill is large
customer_reviews.text: Dr Perlmutter is the authority on gut bacteria and this is the most potent with the most strains in one very large pill.. I have no trouble taking pills but if you do this may not be for you.
customer_reviews.author: Maun Flanagan

customer_reviews.title: Waste of $
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money...did absolutely nothing and smells & tastes horribly of chemicals
customer_reviews.author: T. R.

customer_reviews.title: Not working
customer_reviews.text: I have diarrhea problem for years. I started taking probiotics from another brand which is 40 billions, my diarrhea was under control, I was so happy. But that brand was out of the stock, so I bought this one after I finished that one. Unfortunately this one didn’t do anything at all after I finished whole bottle. So I’m trying another brand now, it’s working again after I started taking it for 3 days. So I’m not going to buy this one again.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Toxic chemical smell and plastic #7 bottle!
customer_reviews.text: Very strong chemical smell and taste on the capsules. I with I would have read the reviews first! They use a toxic plastic too #7. Why? Why would they do this? I’m sending back!
customer_reviews.author: Sherri

customer_reviews.title: LIFE CHANGER
customer_reviews.text: I suffered from BV and yeast infections all the time and I read that taking a quality probiotic might help. I had tried cheaper ones and I didn't notice a difference, still had issues... These ones are AMAZING. I've been taking them for about 3 months and have not had any flare ups- which I previously would get at least once a month. I hate taking big chalky smelling pills but these go down smooth and have little to no taste. My only complaint is that you don't get too many and they are pricey.. BUT it's honestly worth the avoiding of pain and suffering for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product, BAD container.
customer_reviews.text: I really love the probiotic formula. I also love how you can break open the capsules & use them in a smoothie etc. I really dislike how such a great product does not good packaging. The plastic bottle is a #7. This plastic should be used varying EXTREME caution around good or drinks. Very disappointment that this company would even use this plastic. A glass bottle would be preferred.
customer_reviews.author: Ciera Jo Pennington

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: In the past, I’ve had some trouble with BV and yeast infections. These probiotics have been a life-saver!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Probably toxic packaging - intense plastic smell
customer_reviews.text: If you open the bottle, you immediately notice a disgusting and very intense plastic smell - even after days. If you take out a capsule and hold it close to your nose - you will notice the same smell. BASELINE: It seems highly likely that some volatile components of the packaging material migrated into the capsules. Whatever component it is (volatile organic component, plasticizer) - I do not want to have this in my body. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Andreas Buehrle

customer_reviews.title: Used for yeast infections
customer_reviews.text: Bought this supplement to help with serious reoccurring and stubborn yeast infections that I have been struggling with for over a year. Made a huge difference. I’m not great at remembering to take it every day, but when I do, my symptoms almost disappear. This works better than everything the doctor prescribed and everything that others have suggested to me, and it’s cheaper than any of those options! Worth a try if you have serious yeast infections that refuse to go away.
customer_reviews.author: Butcher family

customer_reviews.title: Ladies, Your Hoo Haa Deserves The Best!
customer_reviews.text: LADIIIIIEEEEESSSSS!!! LISTEN LINDAS!!!! Y'ALL. NEED. TO. BUY. THIS. I switched from a very "popular" brand to this, and it was THEEE BEST DECISION EVER! Was upset that I was even using something else, once I tried Garden of Life Dr. Formulated! I don't know how to explain it y'all, but this just makes me feel better! I feel like my hoo haa is being properly regulated, and taken care of. Ladies, seriously! Let this probiotic help get you back on track! And if you see Whole Foods is tripping and selling it for $39.99 (honestly, it's still worth it), then come right over and order it here! Ladies, don't play with your health!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Short 3 capsules
customer_reviews.text: Just received the package. Was cellophane wrapped. Was a large container and it didn’t look like therevwere a lot of capsules. Counted them 3 times and there were only 27 and not 30. Guess the are using same size container for all quantities. I know it is only 3 short but expected to get 30. There ws no cotton in bottle either. Started taking them and got bloated nd running to bthroom. Quit for a few days and tried again. Same result.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Halstead

customer_reviews.title: BV no more !
customer_reviews.text: After months of antibiotics and no end in sight these SAVED me! No more BV ! I’ve been taking one daily for two months and it’s changed my life, I did a ton of research and the hype for this brand is warranted because they are amazing !
customer_reviews.author: Alessia

customer_reviews.title: No side effects.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for 4 years and have been very pleased with the results. My doctor gave me a prescription for a medicine that I had side effects I did not like. With Dr. Formulated Probiotics I've not had any troubles, and it has all the necessary strains I need. It is also gluten, dairy & soy FREE.
customer_reviews.author: Marge A. Cervantez

customer_reviews.title: Miracle Pills
customer_reviews.text: These pills are a miracle in a bottle. If you suffer from chronic yeast and BV this is the answer. Nothing else worked until I came across these magical capsules. I highly recommend them to any female who is need. I double up on days I think I might be getting an annoying yeast infection. I’ve literally tried everything from diflucan, boric acid, creams, gels, you name it and I’ve been prescribed it. I haven’t had to take any of that with these vitamins/probiotics.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but not 30 pills as stated on bottle
customer_reviews.text: Have been using for well over a year now to feel "normal". This is the best probiotic I've used since having candida overgrowth for at least 18 years. However, for the 1st time ever, I counted the contents when my next bottle arrived. It was short 1. I recounted 5 more times to be sure. 29. Pretty steep considering at the price I pay, each capsule is worth $1. Who knows how much money I've lost in the last 1.5 years? Maybe a whole bottle's worth?
customer_reviews.author: Momof4

customer_reviews.title: Gross Smell - Not Taking Them
customer_reviews.text: The inside of the bottle has a strong smell. I looked it up and the bottle is toxic “BPA” ! Why would the manufacturer make a health product and place it in a toxic bottle???
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: I have had Colitis for more than 15 years. I usually have to stay close to a bathroom. After getting a dog bite, which became infected and required strong, strong antibiotics, I started using this brand of probiotic to try to prevent. severe diarrhea. That's what always happens. However this infected bite had a life-changing plus! After about two months, the bite was gone. It also became evident that--the Colitis was gone as well! I am beyond happy! Took two capsules, one at morning, and one at night. I can eat again, which I literally was unable to do most of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Remsberg

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff! Prevented a yeast infection while I was on antibiotics. I always use probiotics but think I will switch to this brand. Didn't have any side effects from it which I think only happens to those who don't normally take a probiotic. NOTE: If youre taking a probiotic while taking antibiotic, please be sure an take them at least two hours apart of you will kill the probiotics and it will be useless!
customer_reviews.author: J2MRIG

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Not for people with migraines. I took the pill for a few days and every time it triggered my migraine. As soon as I stopped the pills, no migraine. If you suffer from migraine, I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: A Must After Menopause
customer_reviews.text: I had never used a probiotic, and I'm happy that my first choice was the best choice. It eliminates bloating, stomach irritation, as well as vaginal dryness, and enables healthy bowel movements.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra ONeil

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: Personally didn't work for me and caused more problems than I had before but that's just me! May be different for you. I read some ppl complaining about the plastic but the newer bottles come with a safety lining. The bottle didn't smell like anything when I opened it, so I was pleased in that area. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: Caused more acne on face
customer_reviews.text: Took a probiotic from this line then once I finished the bottle I decided to try this version. Caused rash like and acne on my face. Taking this and the multiV from same brand. Not sure which one is aggravating my acne. Going to stop taking. Oh and all of a sudden causing headaches for one week straight. Never happened before. Do not buy this!! I will not purchase again. All I wanted to do was keep yeast at bay and start to clean gut issues.
customer_reviews.author: Self_Care_Chic

customer_reviews.title: Something wrong with these!
customer_reviews.text: Have tried this and their other ultimate probiotic which is kept cold. I don't know if it's because these aren't a cold product and instead shelf stable if that is why they work differently but I didn't like these at all. They caused serious bloating and stomach upset issues....like out of nowhere you run to the bathroom or you won't make it type issues. Even the men's version had the same problem for my husband. Be careful if you dare to use these. We will go back to their cold ultimate probiotic one. This one is not worth it and something is seriously not right with these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best probiotic I've tried!
customer_reviews.text: This probiotic is wonderful! I was having indigestion and mild nausea after eating and taking my vitamins. I began taking this probiotic and voila' my intestinal tract is is great again! Thank you so much!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon H.

customer_reviews.title: Chemical smell!! It isn’t the container, it’s the pills!
customer_reviews.text: To those that have been complaining about the smell, I also noticed a strong chemical smell when I opened the package. It was really disturbing so I transferred the pills to a different container to see if that would help. The next day I happen to still have the plastic container they came in and smelled it, no smell at all. It’s the pills that smell like that. I assume it’s the “stable shelf life” capsules. Either way, I didn’t consume them, it’s very questionable!
customer_reviews.author: Henry's

customer_reviews.title: THESE PILLS TASTE AND SMELL LIKE PLASTIC AND CHEMICALS
customer_reviews.text: Buyers beware. I think the smell of the pills and the container they are in are extremely chemical and scary. The flavor or the pills too is very much like swallowing plastic and chemicals. Something about it if off. Will not be purchasing again. The company also sold to Nestle which I do not support and wish I had known sooner. So much plastic waste in the world.
customer_reviews.author: Azin

customer_reviews.title: Bad aftertaste
customer_reviews.text: I've bought these locally and then saw them on Amazon. The pills I've taken that I got from Amazon seem to have an awful "aftertaste". Though these are capsules, once swallowed, I tend to belch up and awful aftertaste that I don't ever recall from the supplements I bought locally. Maybe just a coincidence? Not sure. Will be buying locally in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Wells

customer_reviews.title: Plastic packaging ruins it. It smells so strongly of chemicals.
customer_reviews.text: This probiotic is great. Of all the probiotics I’ve tried, it is by far the best one for me. I unfortunately had to stop using it because the container reeks of chemicals, and the capsules definitely absorb it. It’s such a shame that the packaging is so disgusting on a product I would love to keep using. I would much rather just refrigerate a glass bottle like every other brand of probiotic than have a special “shelf stable” bottle that smells like and makes everything inside of it taste like paint thinner.
customer_reviews.author: Hollygolightly

customer_reviews.title: Horrible plastic smell
customer_reviews.text: The bottles these probiotics are in are horrible. They smell so strongly of chemical plastic, and make the tabs smell and taste horrible too. The probiotics work fine, I would never buy them again though because of the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I can see result now I was taken the prenatal ...
customer_reviews.text: I can see result now I was taken the prenatal and I switch to this one no more yeast vaginal I will order another one next month. Also cure my constipation ,losing my baby weight already 5 pound less after 3 weeks taken in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Vince Carbonaro

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT TO RE BALANCE YOUR REPRODUCTIVE SYSTEM
customer_reviews.text: This probiotic is definitely for women that need extra strength. I used to use RePhresh but honestly I had to take 2-3 at a time to relieve my symptoms. With this one, 1 (although large lol) pill does the trick. Everything for my female repro track is balanced again and I couldn’t be happier. DEFINITELY recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Left me with an upset stomach....
customer_reviews.text: I have taken probiotics for years and have never had a problem. Based on so many positive reviews I switched to Garden of Life and took as directed. The couple of weeks I noticed an upset stomach everyday. Thinking it was probably viral, I continued the probiotics. After a month, I started ruling out anything new or known offenders and discovered it was the new probiotics. So while I am sure they are great for many, they were not good for me.
customer_reviews.author: hear it live

customer_reviews.title: Love garden of life
customer_reviews.text: These were too strong for me, I usually take 10-15 billion it made my stomach upset and my bile was runny. I’m pretty health and I am moderately active. So I decided to give them to my bff, then I read you could open the capsule and put into your tea or juice. Which was a great idea. I open the capsule and pour half of it, in my juice and ingested the whole capsules which is half full the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Reese Linder

customer_reviews.title: Make this a glass bottle please!
customer_reviews.text: Why did they make this in a toxic bottle !? I was taking them for a while and they helped my indigestion super fast, but the bottle is made from toxic material so that defeats the purpose of taking a probiotic.
customer_reviews.author: Violet Rose

customer_reviews.title: My life changed after this products
customer_reviews.text: My life completely changed after my gastro recommended to start taking probiotics. I try 2 different brands and It didn't really help, but this one is the exception. I purchased also the one for men for my husband and he loves it. he is a fitness guy so he knows about supplements and this is the best in the market.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: BV and yeast cure!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been taking these for 3 months and waited to write this review to give the best feedback. I love these probiotics! I’ve struggled with recurrent BV and occasional yeast infections. Since I’ve taken them I haven’t dealt with either one. One time I felt a Bv infection coming on and after 2 days all symptoms were gone which has never happened in the past. As far as the other benefits, they definitely have been keeping me regulated and I’m less bloated. I swear my skin has been more clear as well. I’ll keep taking them!
customer_reviews.author: Dee Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Will always....
customer_reviews.text: This probiotic in my experience will always be the BEST! Target sells this but it only has 40 billion strains. Amazon is the only one that sells this at 50 billion. I immediately returned my Target purchase and bought this from Amazon instead. Ladies if you are experiencing any problems down there then I suggest you purchase this product and see it work its magic! You will also receive delivery in 1-2 days. Mine was next day delivery and I live in Maryland we have an Amazon prime in College Park and in Virginia. That's probably why I received it so fast.
customer_reviews.author: M. Stovall

customer_reviews.title: This product really works! It cleans you out and keeps your gut balanced.
customer_reviews.text: So far the best probiotic I’ve used so far, very strong and definitely cleans you out as needed. I’ve been needing this since my last pregnancy, you can tell it’s good quality and does it’s job. I feel good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible smell not normal
customer_reviews.text: I normally buy at store. But figured this would be easier. But the container smells horrible when i open it. Every time! I’d say buy in store and not from here. Even the pills taste like the horrible smell. If I didn’t throw away the outside box. I’d return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Saved my female health
customer_reviews.text: So this stuff saved my female AND gut health. I break the capsule in orange juice and mix it up (no bad taste ) it’s much easier then taking the large pill. I’ll take this forever , just wish it was cheaper . I no longer get belly nausea like I used to NOR Urinary track infections which I have suffered from for yearsss . It’s been a life saver
customer_reviews.author: damronville

customer_reviews.title: Approved
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing 7 or so different probiotics while waiting for test results for a recurrent issue I decided to employ the milk test. This one passed with flying colors. So value for the money and proof that you're getting live cultures is enough to say you're not getting something janky. Stihl recommend refrigerating it even though not needed
customer_reviews.author: Alice X.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for People who are Hyper-Sensitive
customer_reviews.text: I have PCOS and needed a probiotic to help me regain balance. I have a sensitivity to many vegan alternatives substances, like Soy. So this product was perfect. I suffered from chronic stomach problems, as well. Ever since taking this supplement, I noticed my digestive system has improved dramatically. When i don't take it for a while I can tell the difference. Definitely a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Latoya M Michel

customer_reviews.title: Just Ok Nothing Special
customer_reviews.text: These pills were just o.k., nothing special about them. They worked very slowly as it related to improving my digestive health and irregularity. I ordered them based on all of the positive reviews but I'm not impressed. I still suffered with constipated and incomplete BMs using this product. I will continue to use the remainder of the pills, which comes in a plastic bottle and only half filled, but will not reorder and do not recommend for the price. P.S. I have used other probiotics that were specifically for women and they were MUCH MUCH better so I had something to compare these too.
customer_reviews.author: LRB1112

customer_reviews.title: Smelly Capsules
customer_reviews.text: I wish that i would have read the reviews about this particular packaging. i have bought probiotics by this company in the past that were in a glass jars and needed refrigeration, this plastic bottle though makes the capsules smell and taste like a weird chemical. i bought these to help with some nausea i've been experiencing lately, and they make my nausea worse because of the smell. i transferred them to a glass jar hoping that would help, but alas... it has not.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Coppola-Allured

customer_reviews.title: Good did your gut
customer_reviews.text: I’m feeling well on this product. Just don’t understand why amazon would set up subscription delivery for every other month when there are 30 capsules per bottle & I take one per day. I end up running out 2 weeks before subscription delivery & have to order separate without discount. It should’ve been set up for delivery every month.
customer_reviews.author: Patty C.

customer_reviews.title: This product has saved me
customer_reviews.text: I was having all kinds of digestive issues (constipation and tummy sensitivity) and started taking this product years ago. They have all been resolved from this product. Hard to believe but it's true. I've been on it for years. I have tried trying cheaper probiotics and always end up going back to this one. On a personal note: I'm a 57 year old women and have had to go to the Dr. for a special cream for my women's area if you know what I mean. This probiotic has opened up that area without having to use that cream that was full of chemicals. As I said I have used this for years and will continue....
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Has terrible smell - will never buy again!
customer_reviews.text: The plastic container stinks really, As when you open the bottle It smells so bad and the smell transfers to the flavor of the capsule which lasted on my tongue for hours. I have to wash them under the running water to try to remove the bad taste, and that helps somewhat. I cancelled my subscribe and save order. They must have changed from a glass container to this terrible bottle because I used it before and it was not in this container that smelled so bad.
customer_reviews.author: SCB

customer_reviews.title: Gross plastic taste
customer_reviews.text: I read some of the reviews about it having a funky taste possibly due to the packaging and I have to agree. Overall I think the probiotic itself works. I noticed less bloating and it wasn’t too big to swallow but I couldn’t get past the gross taste. It’s like a weird plastic taste. The taste alone makes me not recommend it. You don’t have to refrigerate it but I tried it that way too to see if the taste would go away and it did not.
customer_reviews.author: CG380

customer_reviews.title: toxic number 7 bottle
customer_reviews.text: Sadly had to stop using because the bottle it is packaged in is a number 7 bottle. It really does smell terrible. When they change the packaging, I'll go back to purchasing. Will have to find another probiotic in the meantime. So annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Amada Y. Castro

customer_reviews.title: Works for GI issues!
customer_reviews.text: I have suffered from GI issues since I was a child. Always in and out of the hospital severely I'll with no diagnoses. I just finished my first bottle of this after the first month and haven't felt as much all day nausea that I usually have, after meal sickness, or constipation. It is expensive and I almost didn't reorder just because long term it's a big investment but finally feeling better is worth every penny. I will update after the second bottle is over.
customer_reviews.author: Genny

customer_reviews.title: Boo
customer_reviews.text: Used to love this brand, until they sold out to Nestle. I no longer trust the product or the brand, and have switched to a different company.
customer_reviews.author: Eryn C

customer_reviews.title: Decent Probiotic!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent probiotic. I have never taken a probiotic pill before so I have nothing to compare it to. I used to drink kombucha for its "probiotic" benefits but the acidity hurt my stomach. I have had zero negative effects from this pill and have taken it for over a month.
customer_reviews.author: Aries007

customer_reviews.title: Very effective
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is these pills seem to be working very well. I was never a believer in probiotics but during the summer I tend to swim a lot and leave my bikini bottoms on too long...which always inevitably leads to a yeast infection. A doctor recommended I go on a probiotic to help combat this and ever since i started taking these, I went back to lounging in my bathing suits by the pool all day and haven’t had another infection since. I’m very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Meggo

customer_reviews.title: Weird chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: This product had a weird chemical smell and after taste. I returned the product and they quickly processed a refund.
customer_reviews.author: MoSunflower

customer_reviews.title: Bacterial / yeast
customer_reviews.text: Works after a month of taking it constantly. Got to be consistent to see results .. it helped balanced my ph and stuff . I stopped having Bacterial and yeast infection all the time
customer_reviews.author: K. Dimm

customer_reviews.title: No chemical smell and all capsules present
customer_reviews.text: I noticed that the container is a bit big for it's 30 capsule content. There was no chemical smell. The box it came in had that clear round seal on both ends of the box. I don't recall if the container itself was sealed. I had 30 capsules. I have been taking them for 6 days. I'll let you know if I have any issues good or bad that I didn't have 6 days ago. With covid 19 happening now it might take a while to get a accurate account. We'll see 24 more days.
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: smell
customer_reviews.text: The smell of the pills/bottle smelled like fumes, a dangerous strong smell!!! I don't feel any better aftetr taking it for two months now either. Very hard to swallow!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Grayson

customer_reviews.title: I like the product very much but the comapany seems to ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the product very much but the comapany seems to have quality contro issues since this is the 2nd time i order this product online and i get less pills. at this price and getton 25 instead i of 30 i dont think i will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Aiza Cano

customer_reviews.title: Awful chemical smell!
customer_reviews.text: I have previously bought this product from my local health food store. Since the price on Amazon is much lower, I tried ordering. However, when I opened the container there was a very strong chemical smell. I tried to leave it open to air it out and the capsules smell awful. I am afraid to take them as I do not want to get sick or put poison in my body. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: LaylaLucia

customer_reviews.title: Product failed the milk test, as it has no ...
customer_reviews.text: Product failed the milk test, as it has no, or very little substance to its effectiveness....dont buy as product can not be returned.
customer_reviews.author: gabillh

product_meta.title: Garden of Life Dr. Formulated Probiotics for Women, Once Daily Women’s Probiotics, 50 Billion CFU Guaranteed, 16 Strains, Shelf Stable, Gluten Dairy & Soy Free One a Day, Prebiotic Fiber, 30 Capsules
product_meta.description: Size:30 Count (Pack of 1)Dr. Formulated Probiotics Once Daily Women’s is a unique “just one capsule a day” shelf stable probiotic. Once Daily Women's is a specifically designed vegetarian supplement with a high probiotic count to support a healthy microbiome and women’s specific health needs. Dr. Perlmutter created this unique formula with a high count of beneficial probiotics made from diverse strains, including Lactobacilli and Bifidobacteria, that are resistant to stomach acid and bile, exclusively for women’s digestion, immune system health. David Perlmutter, M.D., is an expert in the human microbiome, a board-certified neurologist, Fellow of the American College of Nutrition, America’s brain-health expert and #1 New York Times best-selling author.
feature_bullets: DIGESTION SUPPORT: This once daily probiotic supplement contains Lactobaccilus acidophilus and Bifidobacteria for digestive health and constipation relief
PROBIOTICS FOR WOMEN: Specially formulated probiotic for women's specific health needs contains L. reuteri and L. fermentum for vaginal health
IMMUNE SUPPORT: This dietary supplement has 50 billion CFU and 16 probiotics for immune system health
SHELF STABLE PROBIOTICS: This 50 billion probiotics supplement comes in 30 one daily capsules; no refrigeration required
HYPOALLERGENIC PROBIOTIC: Our probiotic is dairy free, gluten free, soy free, and vegetarian

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
